text:
Tanggapan saya mengenai video ini adalah:
Polusi udara terjadi karena dua faktor, yaitu faktor alami dan faktor manusia. Faktor alami seperti berasal dari gunung yang meletus. Dan faktor manusia berasal dari perbuatan manusia, seperti pembakaran bahan bakar fosil , knalpot kendaraan , dan lain sebagainya. Pembakaran bahan bakar fosil dapat menyebabkan lepasnya gas rumah kaca. Sehingga menyebabkan emisi seperti karbon dioksida, metana, nitro oksida dan gas berfluorinasi memerangkap panas dari matahari di atmosfer bumi. Hal ini menyebabkan kenaikan suhu global, yang menciptakan perubahan iklim. Polusi udara menyebabkan berbagai macam kerugian dan menyebabkan berbagai hal yang berbahaya. Seperti rusaknya lingkungan, banyak nya tanaman yang mati, dan lainnya. Kesehatan manusia juga ikut dirugikan , karena dapa menyebabkan gangguan pernapasan, iritasi mata, komplikasi reproduksi dan lainnya. Tentu saja hal itu perlu di atasi. Cara mengatasi polusi salah satu nya adalah dengan beralih menggunakan kendaraan umum, menanam pohon, dan menghentikan penggunaan listrik yang berlebih. 

Semoga polusi udara di Indonesia dapat diminimalisir kan.

text: In my opinion, Pollution is a dangerous contaminant in the natural environment that causes instability, disturbance and danger to the ecosystem. We may often associate air pollution with dust or smoke, but there are several types of pollution. Air pollution can be caused by vehicle emissions, volcanic eruptions, industrial emissions, and forest fires. The increase in the content of hazardous substances in the air is referred to as air pollution. Air pollution can be exacerbated by increasing traffic congestion, population growth, rapid economic growth and industrialization. The main content of fossil fuels is hydrocarbons and small amounts of nitrogen and sulfur or sulfur. Inhaling these gases in large quantities will be very dangerous and can cause various respiratory problems. Severe air pollution can also form acid rain. Acid rain occurs when nitrogen oxides and sulfur are dissolved in rain. The consequences of acid rain are quite alarming, which can kill aquatic life when water levels become acidic. how to handle it? with reduced use of motorized or four-wheeled vehicles. a healthy life walking may be a drawback

text: In late afternoon on October 3, there had been a yellow smog engulfing the South Bay in Los Angeles County where oil refineries clutter.  The air was so bad that it made me cough non-stop & I felt like my throat was closing on me the minute I stepped out of the house. The whole area was like a movie shot edited with yellow hint all over, very eerie like it was the end of the world. But it was air pollution because my throat's reaction told me so. I had to take the allergy medicine and use an inhaler.   Don't let the fake news fool you into believing that the Democrats-owned  state of California has better air. It is not true.  Democrats passed laws to make it look good on paper against air pollution, by creating unnecessary burden for the average person, e.g.,  forcing relatively new cars to pay for smog tests, meanwhile, you saw a lot of the metro buses bumping out black choking smoke or grandfathered older cars that are pumping out the same choking black smoke everywhere.  New cars always passed the smog test because they are made with smog control. Mandatory smog tests on relatively new cars did nothing to improve air quality other than enriching the government with more testing fees and the licensing fees from the smog test centers. You rarely see new cars pumping out black smoke.   Yet the big polluting old cars and the buses seem to be exempted from the smog test law and are allowed to freely pump out black choking smoke wherever they go.  The average people are  made to pay the unnecessary fees to smog test our cars just to get the almost defaulted "pass" paper.  Meanwhile, the Democrats made other laws to either not include emission from oil refineries from the "clean air" measure, so they can self-congratulate themselves, or they passed other laws to allow big polluters to buy the credits to pollute.   In addition to having bad air, we also have to suffer in crimes from all criminal gangs from all over the world, and we have to spend our taxes to pay for free healthcare for all illegal immigrants and the foreign criminal gangs who are enjoy their sanctuary granted by the Democrats.

text:
Ignorance at its finest. I really don't know how many times people have to be told; the consequences of anthropogenic activity since the industrial revolution are not direct causes of climate change. Our activites and pollution are however increasing the RATE at which the climate changes. This is the important fact that a lot of climate sceptics seem to miss. 

And again, a mild summer doesn't mean shit. It's a statistical anomaly compared to the GLOBAL average increase in temperatures. With increased GLOBAL temperarures comes greater local seasonal variability with extremes occuring with greater frequencies at both ends of the spectrum.

text:
the answer to your question is 0. But your question has literally nothing to do with the issue we face today. Climate has always changed. Nobody denies that. 
Let me try to explain the problem to you. At the peak of the last ice age, global temperatures were about 5 degrees Celsius colder than they are today. The peak of the last ice age, or the glacial maximum, was about 21000 years ago. If you use basic math, divide 21000 by 5, it means it took the earth 4200 years to warm just 1 degree Celsius. 
Then comes the industrial revolution, and now, it took just 200 years for the temperature to rise 1 degree. 
The problem isn't that the climate is changing, the problem is that it's changing TOO FAST. And it's going to affect all of us.

first off thanks for intelligent debate. I hate trying to debate emotion driven babble like the greasy gentleman who commented before you. I happen to disagree about anthropogenic climate change, that doesn't mean I like going to the north pole to club polar bears and baby seals. I do believe in responsible energy consumption and i dislike pollution and littering. 
I'm going to try a different approach on this one. the link above shows co2 history and you can see that it has risen faster in our planet's history, it just sounds more dramatic to say "never in the history of mankind". co2 levels have been lower and higher and life still exists. al gore only wants you to see the parts of the chart that scare you into giving him money and buying his crap. let me ask a couple questions please
1) what is the primary source of all climate and energy in our solar system? the sun right?
2) is the energy from the sun always the exact same ? no, not only is the sun brighter lately but solar flares cause a great variation in solar energy.
3) why is summer hot and winter cold? is it because of co2 higher and lower? or is it because of our planet tilting slightly on its axis? planet is 100¬∞ (and more) colder simply because our planet tilts away slightly from the sun . 
so we agree that the sun is the most powerful thing in the history of our solar system but somehow co2 which is only 0.04% of our atmospheric gases somehow overpowers it? co2 is not only the tail that wags the dog but it is the eyelash that bats the person. co2 sure sounds bad on the news but the facts don't add up. research climate hoax and find many climatologists who disagree with anthropogenic climate change.

author: jeff westbrooke

text:
Jeff mate, as soon as you link a blog post as your source it takes away any credibility in your argument. wattsupwiththat.com is run by an uncertified meteorologist, whose viewpoints are rarely backed up by references, and a lot of what he has said has been debunked elsewhere already. The graph in that link you put up was referenced, but the interpretation and explanation of it and everything else in that blog remained unsupported. 

Research does not consist of reading blog posts and watching a few youtube videos; may I suggest you do your own research. Sure, you're entitled to your own opinion, but your opinion isn't fact, and I'm all up for an intelligent debate, but the time for that has passed. 

The supposed link between increased solar flare activity and global temperatures has already been pulled apart and shown to have some connection up until 1980, when solar activity plateaued while temperatures continued to rise. Additionally, the whole idea that a concentration of 400ppm of CO2 can't cause a greater effect on Earth's climate than the sun is complete bullocks. For example, maximum atmospheric chlorine from CFCs only reached 0.003 ppm. Yet, it caused significant depletion of the ozone layer, which is still repairing itself today. So concentrations mean very little without acknowledging the effect of the substance, which you have failed to do. 

By the way, I hope you don't think I'm jailing you because my facts disagree with your "alternative facts" from blog posts. I also didn't include any links because I know how much you love to do your own research. Happy conspiracy hunting! :)

you're partly wrong Kelly, search for "How to green the world's deserts and reverse climate change | Allan Savory" on youtube, and watch the video. If you don't want to watch that whole video,  here's an ELI5: If grasslands aren't degraded biologically during the dry season by cattle eating and shitting, the grass oxidates, dies, leaving the soil infertile as just dead material. To prevent that we usually just burn it all up which allows new plants and grass to grow, in total we burn up 1 billion hectares of grasslands, thats a mindboggling amount of carbon nobodys talking about it.

By introducing large amounts of cattle, mimicking nature, we would slowly turn desert into grassland, and keep the soil fertile by letting the cattle degrade the dead grass, the cattle would feed people, and food aid wouldn't be necessary.
